messages.subject: Fanart of Nakano TAkeko
messages.msgSnippet: http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/aizuwomensbrigade.jpg notice Nakano TAkeko and her sister Nakano Yuuko I stared at the pic for a while...figured that both
messages.messageBody:
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/aizuwomensbrigade.jpg
notice Nakano TAkeko and her sister Nakano Yuuko
I stared at the pic for a while...figured that both figures were
really beautiful then I drew this after deciding to combine both
designs
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/NakanoTAkeko.jpg
the difference in mine is that Nakano Takeko is holding her death
poem folded up in her right hand
secretarytocapt3
AIM Badgerturtle
